A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Definitely not for any true star wars fan\, while it has interesting ideas\, the failure in execution by Johnson dooms the movie. An entire sub-plot that seems forced and out if place\, slows an already long movie. The time lines is off\, and so many plot holes you'll break and ankle trying to avoid them. And of you were ever a fan of Luke Skywalker and his legacy\, then this is a movie you should avoid.
